Up to ten willing creatures you can see within range gain this ability for the duration.

spells.notes: Until the spell ends, you control any freestanding water inside an area you choose that is a cube up to 100 feet on a side. Flood, Part Water, Redirect Flow, Whirpool

spells.name: Locate Creature
spells.notes:
The spell can locate a specific creature known to you, or the nearest creature of a specific kind in 1000ft. If the creature you described or named is in a different form the spells doesnt work.
This spell can't locate a creature if running water at least 10 feet wide blocks a direct path between you and the creature.

spells.name: Plane Shift
spells.component: a forked, metal rod worth at least 250 gp, attuned to a particular plane of existence
spells.notes: You and up to eight willing creatures who link hands in a circle are transported to a different plane of existence. You can use this spell to banish an unwilling creature to another plane. Choose a creature within your reach and make a melee spell attack against it.

raw.Name: Plane Shift
raw.Component: a forked, metal rod worth at least 250 gp, attuned to a particular plane of existence
raw.Notes: You and up to eight willing creatures who link hands in a circle are transported to a different plane of existence. You can use this spell to banish an unwilling creature to another plane. Choose a creature within your reach and make a melee spell attack against it.

spells.name: Ressurection
spells.component: a diamond worth at least 1,000 gp, which the spell consumes
spells.notes:
You touch a dead creature that has been dead for no more than a century, that didn't die of old age, and that isn't undead.
Casting this spell to restore life to a creature that has been dead for one year or longer taxes you greatly.
spells.preparation: Ressurect the Heroes of the DTX

spells.name: Temple of the Gods
spells.component: a holy symbol worth at least 5 gp
spells.notes: The temple must fit within an unoccupied cube of space, up to 120 feet on each side. The temple remains until the spell ends.

spells.name: Antimagic Field
spells.notes: Spells and other magical effects, except those created by an artifact or a deity, are suppressed in the sphere and can't protrude into it.
